name: Super Battlelands
description:
Super Battlelands is Fast Paced Strategy!

Play Super Battlelands! The modern fast paced turn based strategy game! Inspired by Advance Wars it comes complete with 8+ skirmish maps plus a map editor for infinite fun!

  • FEATURES: INFINITE HOURS OF GAME PLAY!

Fight the CPU Red Menace on the shores of a mega city. Or crush the Purple Invaders on a map of your design!

  • FEATURES: FOUR TEAMS OF VARIOUS COLORS!

Extreme care went into the artificial intelligence to provide a fast & fluid play experience. The CPU moves instantly with no pauses between turns. Yet it moves with such intelligence that every map is a challenge!

  • FEATURES: UP TO 3 CPU PLAYERS VS 1 HUMAN
You are the Commander!

In Super Battlelands command your forces to the conquer! With over 11 units types at your command use cunning skill to out smart the Artificial Intelligence. Every map has been hand crafted for your enjoyment and challenge.

  • FEATURES: MORE UNITS THAN YOU HAVE FINGERS!

Challenge yourself against an AI or open the map editor and give yourself an easy win.

  • FEATURES: YOU CAN CHEAT WITH THE MAP EDITOR!
Controls
Movement: [w] [↑] [a][s][d] or [←][↓][→] Action: [SPACE] or [ENTER] Use mouse for main menuChange LogVersion 4.0
